trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Validate the Azure VNET to use with Azure RemoteApp" description="Learn how to make sure your Azure VNET is ready to use with Azure RemoteApp" services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="Validate the Azure VNET to use with Azure RemoteApp" description="Learn how to make sure your Azure VNET is ready to use with Azure RemoteApp" services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />

trans-unit.source: Before you use an Azure VNET with Azure RemoteApp, you might want to validate the VNET.
trans-unit.target: Before you use an Azure VNET with Azure RemoteApp, you might want to validate the VNET.

trans-unit.source: This helps prevent issues with connectivity.
trans-unit.target: This helps prevent issues with connectivity.

trans-unit.source: To validate your Azure VNET, do the following:
trans-unit.target: To validate your Azure VNET, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Create an Azure virtual machine inside the subnet of the Azure VNET you want to use with Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Create an Azure virtual machine inside the subnet of the Azure VNET you want to use with Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Connect to that VM by using the Connect option in the management portal.
trans-unit.target: Connect to that VM by using the Connect option in the management portal.

trans-unit.source: Join the virtual machine to the same domain that you want to use with Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Join the virtual machine to the same domain that you want to use with Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: If this is successful, the Azure VNET is ready to use with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: If this is successful, the Azure VNET is ready to use with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the end-to-end hybrid collection workflow, see the following articles:
trans-unit.target: For more information about the end-to-end hybrid collection workflow, see the following articles:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Deploy Azure RemoteApp collection to your Azure Virtual Network (with support for ExpressRoute)</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Deploy Azure RemoteApp collection to your Azure Virtual Network (with support for ExpressRoute)</linkText><title></title>
